scripts.build-sass: sass static/sass/main.scss static/css/main.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer --map false --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build: yarn run build-docs && yarn run build-sass && yarn run build-js
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
